name: Criminology, Law and Society
notes: Credits: Students must have a minimum of 4.0 credits.

Prerequisite Course(s): Students must have a final mark of 70% in their first successful attempt at UTM SOC100H5 or a final mark of 73% in each of two 0.5 credit UTM SOC courses at the 200 level or above.
Cumulative Grade Point Average (CGPA): The Department of Sociology determines the CGPA requirement each admission period in relation to the number of applicants and it is never below 2.00.
